channel.title: Ok, um new problem
channel.description:
:eek: PROBLEM :eek:
(1)
Now I've fixed the probelm I posted earlier about my stats being all messed up now I face a new one.
( Isn't it typical how when you fix a hard problem andother 10 show up in its place!)
I just would like help on:
When I open up my compile.bat, press "R" then "Enter" to make my "runserver" appear, open up my "Moparscape 3.2" window, Input my server adress ( which is samscape.servebeer.com ) Login.
I have someone elses world appear.
Is this something to do with my client.java? If so will I have to re-code the entire thing! There must be another way.
HOW CAN I FIX THIS
Also, when I open my "Moparscape 3.2" window, WITHOUT opening the "Runserver" I seem to get my own world, sort of like the default "Hybridscape" yet it is under my own server address. Can I create anything with this or must I stick with using "Runserver" Thanks
Hmpph :)
(2)
P.P.S
Can Anyone make me some shortcut codes for spawn bulk items ( {EXAMPLE} ::melee = Full dragon, whip, fire cape, E.T.C ) And teach / tell me where to put them.
P.P.P.S
(3)
Lastly, Spawning items like "fire cape" , "dragon 2h" and "amulet of fury" And NPC's like "Kalphite Queen" Seems to Disconnect me from my client. Any tips on fixing that.
Thanks heaps for taking the time to help me once more. And yet again your help will be greatly appreciated upon finding a solution for this problem.
{WHEN ANSWERING A QUESTION :NOTE: ADD THE NUMBER ABOVE EACH QUESTION} {IT WILL JUST MAKE IT EASIER FOR ME TO DEAL WITH LOL} {DON'T WORRY IF YOU DON'T THOUGH} :) :P :)
Hmpph

item.title: Ok, um new problem
item.dc:creator: @Ancient_Snipe Ancient Snipe
item.description:
@Ancient_Snipe wrote:

Problem Number (2)

To use commands , you first need a working compiler, i think you have

  • open client.java and search for /*END OF FRAME TESTING*/
    -after that, press “Enter”
    -Now the basics of commands
  • this are the real basics
else if (command.startsWith("*"))
{
addItem(*,1);
}[/code]
-Okay so the first * means the command for example melee
[code]else if (command.startsWith("melee"))

  • you will need to type ::melee

  • Now the additem part

{ addItem(*,1); }
-The second * means the item code -look in item.cfg and search for the item you want and look for the code at the beginning
-now add everything you need

  • you can add more addItem if you want.
    -Save & Compile & Run & type ::melee (or your code)

Read full topic

item.title: Ok, um new problem
item.dc:creator: @hmpph hmpph
item.description:
@hmpph wrote:

                              :eek: PROBLEM :eek:

(1)

Now I’ve fixed the probelm I posted earlier about my stats being all messed up now I face a new one.

( Isn’t it typical how when you fix a hard problem andother 10 show up in its place!)

I just would like help on:

When I open up my compile.bat, press “R” then “Enter” to make my “runserver” appear,
open up my “Moparscape 3.2” window,
Input my server adress ( which is samscape.servebeer.com )
Login.

I have someone elses world appear.

Is this something to do with my client.java?
If so will I have to re-code the entire thing!
There must be another way.

HOW CAN I FIX THIS

Also, when I open my “Moparscape 3.2” window, WITHOUT opening the “Runserver”
I seem to get my own world, sort of like the default “Hybridscape” yet it is under my own server address.
Can I create anything with this or must I stick with using “Runserver”
Thanks

Hmpph

(2)

P.P.S

Can Anyone make me some shortcut codes for spawn bulk items
( {EXAMPLE} ::melee = Full dragon, whip, fire cape, E.T.C )
And teach / tell me where to put them.

P.P.P.S

(3)

Lastly,
Spawning items like “fire cape” , “dragon 2h” and “amulet of fury”
And NPC’s like “Kalphite Queen”
Seems to Disconnect me from my client.
Any tips on fixing that.

Thanks heaps for taking the time to help me once more.
And yet again your help will be greatly appreciated upon finding a solution for this problem.
